message:
Hello Bold Munch! 🎉

I'm interested in event catering for:
☑ Birthday party (adults)
☐ Wedding celebration
☐ Corporate event/meeting
☐ Baby shower
☐ Graduation party
☐ Anniversary celebration
☐ Holiday party (Christmas/Easter)
☐ Other special event

Event details:
• Date & time: Saturday, August 24th, 2:00 PM
• Number of guests: 25 people
• Preferred items: Mini banana breads variety pack
• Special requirements: Some guests have nut allergies

Please contact me to discuss!

Thank you! 🍰
